message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with video action detection and proposes a new method for weakly-supervised temporal action localization. This falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of iterative refinement and pseudo ground truth generation, which are common techniques in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper evaluates its method on two standard action datasets, which falls under the multimedia (cs.MM) sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the effectiveness of different pseudo ground truth generators, which is related to information retrieval (cs.IR).
